Ubuntu Install

= Instructions =
 # Install the base deps
{{{
$ sudo aptitude install rng-tools postgresql apache2 apache2-threaded-dev gcc g++ make libexpat1-dev libapache2-mod-perl2 libclass-dbi-perl libnet-cidr-perl libossp-uuid-perl libxml-libxml-perl libxml2-dev libmodule-install-perl libapache2-request-perl libdbd-pg-perl bind9 libregexp-common-perl libxml-rss-perl libapache2-mod-gnutls libapreq2-dev rsync libunicode-string-perl libconfig-simple-perl libmodule-pluggable-perl libmime-lite-perl libfile-type-perl libtext-csv-perl libio-socket-inet6-perl libapr1-dbg libhtml-table-perl libdate-manip-perl libtry-tiny-perl libclass-accessor-perl pkg-config libnet-ssleay-perl vim libjson-xs-perl
}}}
 # Install the remaining CPAN modules
{{{
$ sudo perl -MCPAN -e 'install Net::Abuse::Utils,DateTime::Format::DateParse,Regexp::Common::net::CIDR,Text::Table,Linux::Cpuinfo,LWP::Protocol::https,Google::ProtocolBuffers,Iodef::Pb::Simple,Compress::Snappy,Digest::SHA1,Time::HiRes,Net::Abuse::Utils::Spamhaus,Net::Patricia,Net::SSLeay'
}}}
